articles.title: Coronavirus spreads in French parliament
articles.description: A second member of France's National Assembly has been taken to hospital after contracting coronavirus and five other lawmakers are being tested for the illness, the lower house's presidency said in a statement on Saturday.

articles.title: CPAC attendee tests positive for coronavirus
articles.description: Organizers of the Conservative Political Action Conference, or CPAC, said an attendee of its annual Washington-area conference last month has tested positive for coronavirus.
